definition: to breathe out
to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Breathe out through pursed lips as if you were whistling.
sentences.chinese: 從閉合嘴脣中呼氣，就好像在吹口哨。

sentences.english: The whales expired with a rushing sound.
sentences.chinese: 那些鯨魚呼氣時發出一種急促的聲音。

sentences.english: Engage and exhale to do an Attitude Press in non-traditional Pilates.
sentences.chinese: 參與和呼氣做非傳統普拉提一種態度出版社。

sentences.english: The inulin hydrogen breath test accurately reflects orocaecal transit time.
sentences.chinese: 菊粉氫呼氣試驗精確反映口盲傳輸時間。

sentences.english: Two arms curving and inspiration, supporting and expiration.
sentences.chinese: 兩臂彎曲時吸氣，撐直時呼氣。

sentences.english: Stop yanking at my shawl; I can't breathe.
sentences.chinese: 別拉着我的圍巾不放，我不能呼氣了。

sentences.english: The accused question the result of the breathalyser test.
sentences.chinese: 被告對呼氣測醉試驗結果表示懷疑。

sentences.english: When the head is stable, sword arm enters water, resumptive below one slowly expiratory process.
sentences.chinese: 頭部穩定時，右臂入水，再開始下一慢慢呼氣的過程。

sentences.english: Ever notice the fog you can make on a window by breathing on it?
sentences.chinese: 是否有注意過自己往窗戶上呼氣形成的水霧呢？

sentences.english: C-octanoic acid breath test may represent a feasible method for measurement of gastric emptying.
sentences.chinese: 辛酸呼氣試驗是檢測胃排空的理想選擇。

sentences.english: On the exhale bend your elbows and lower your chest onto your thighs.
sentences.chinese: 呼氣時曲手肘，胸部向下放於大腿上。

sentences.english: Exhale and lean to right keeping hips and buttocks flat on floor.
sentences.chinese: 呼氣向右傾斜，保持髖部和臀平貼於地面。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of maximal expiratory flow on the ventilatory response to exercise.
sentences.chinese: 目的本文探討了最大呼氣量對運動通氣反應的影響。

sentences.english: As you exhale, rock your pelvis forward and release.
sentences.chinese: 而當你呼氣時，將盆骨往前移同時放鬆肌肉。

sentences.english: There are no words or language; their voice makes no sound.
sentences.chinese: 把一次呼氣切換成各不相同的聲音就形成了語言。

definition: to inhale/to draw in breath
to exhale/to blow off steam/(phonetics) aspirated
hindbrain/back of the head
to stretch taut/(of muscles etc) taut/strained/tense
to press/to push (a button)
to abrade/to scrape/to chafe/to graze/abrasion/friction burn/scratch
to take a breath (in swimming)/to ventilate
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
to turn sth around/to swivel
to press down/to crush down/to restrain (anger)/to keep down (voice)
gas (i.e. gaseous substance)
vein
to pull tight/tensioning
to release/to let go/to loosen/to untie/to come loose
arms/both arms/two arms
to pull back/to shrink/to contract/(physiology) systole
to sway/to swing/to move back and forth/to oscillate
